verbs.description: [ARG0: The majority of Americans] [V: view] [ARG1: the current economy] [ARGM-MNR: favorably] and most credit President Trump and his policies . They think Trump is more likely to look out for interests of big businesses and the wealthy over the middle and working class .

The majority of Americans view the current economy favorably and most credit President Trump and his policies . [ARG0: They] [V: think] [ARG1: Trump is more likely to look out for interests of big businesses and the wealthy over the middle and working class] .

The majority of Americans view the current economy favorably and most credit President Trump and his policies . They think [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: more likely to look out for interests of big businesses and the wealthy over the middle and working class] .

The majority of Americans view the current economy favorably and most credit President Trump and his policies . They think [ARG0: Trump] is more likely to [V: look] out [ARG1: for interests of big businesses and the wealthy] [ARG2: over the middle and working class] .
